title: Garmin vívosport: With Built-in GPS, Work Out When You Want, Where You Want
description:
Work out how you want, where you want with vívosport. Featuring built-in GPS and a selection of indoor and outdoor activity apps, you can take your game on the go. Or not. The choice is entirely yours.

Lets you work out inside or use built-in GPS to accurately track activities outside 
Includes fitness monitoring tools1, such as VO2 max and fitness age estimates
All-day stress tracking1 helps you stay in touch with your body’s response to potential stressors
Features an always-on color display and slim profile
Get connected features2 such as smart notifications, music controls and more
Battery life3: up to 7 days in smartwatch mode; 8 hours in GPS mode

1See Garmin.com/ataccuracy
2When paired with a compatible smartphone; see Garmin.com/ble
3Battery life may vary depending on usage
